perturbation.original_text: Such fee will be computed daily and payable monthly by Nationwide within thirty (30) days of receipt from you of a valid invoice (in excel format) that identifies, for each CUSIP of each Fund, the number of sub-accounts, participants or beneficial shareholders serviced by you and such other information as may be necessary to validate the fee payable.
perturbation.changed_text: Such fee will be computed daily and payable monthly by Nationwide within sixty (60) days of receipt from you of a valid invoice (in excel format) that identifies, for each CUSIP of each Fund, the number of sub-accounts, participants or beneficial shareholders serviced by you and such other information as may be necessary to validate the fee payable.
perturbation.explanation: This change introduces a contradiction regarding payment deadlines. Section 6 originally stated payment within 30 days of invoice receipt. This has been changed to 60 days, contradicting the original term of 30 days in the payment deadline clause and creating uncertainty about when late fees apply, per the example provided.

perturbation.original_text: You agree to transmit the requested information that is on your books and records to the Fund or its designee promptly, but in any event not later than five (5) business days, after receipt of a request.
perturbation.changed_text: You agree to transmit the requested information that is on your books and records to the Fund or its designee promptly, but in any event not later than ten (10) business days, after receipt of a request.
perturbation.explanation: This change introduces a contradiction regarding the time frame for delivering requested information. Section 18.1.2 originally stated 'not later than five (5) business days', which has been altered to 'not later than ten (10) business days'. This contradiction creates uncertainty about which deadline applies, resulting in uncertainty and enforceability issues.

perturbation.original_text: You agree to execute instructions as soon as reasonably practicable, but not later than five business days after your receipt of the instructions.
perturbation.changed_text: You agree to execute instructions as soon as reasonably practicable, but not later than ten business days after your receipt of the instructions.
perturbation.explanation: This change introduces a contradiction in execution timeline for instructions. Section 18.2.2 originally stated 'not later than five business days', but this has been changed to 'not later than ten business days'. This creates ambiguity and enforceability issues, creating uncertainty.
